seg.quote: I have even worse news for you.

sense.def:
Worse
je tudi primernik prislova
badly
.

seg.quote: Some people ski worse than others.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo, ki je bolan,
gets worse
, postane še bolj bolan.

seg.quote: You'll get worse if you don't take this medicine.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo ali nekaj
none the worse for something
, mu nekaj ne škoduje.

seg.quote: The children had gone to bed very late but they were none the worse for it.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi
for the worse
, okoliščine postanejo bolj neprijetne ali težje.

seg.quote: There were constant changes, usually for the worse.
